prompt: How do I reset my password and set up multi-factor authentication (MFA) on our company systems?
response: To reset your password and configure MFA, log in to the company portal. Go to the settings section, select 'Change Password', follow the prompts to create a new password. Then navigate to the security settings to enable MFA using a trusted method such as an authenticator app or SMS codes.
